articles.content: Gynecological health is an important aspect of a woman's overall well-being. Women often hesitate to discuss their gynecological health concerns with their doctors, but it's important to remember tha… [+1765 chars]

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Insufficient sleep linked to years of poor heart health: Study - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Insufficient sleep may increase the risk of heart disease and potentially cause early mortality over the course of two to seven years, according to a recent study conducted by Southern Denmark University and University of Sydney experts.
